## Container.merge() method

Merge a supplied value with an existing repository value

Signature:

```typescript
merge(key: string, value: any): this;
```

Decorators:

`@bind`

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type   | Description                                |
| --------- | ------ | ------------------------------------------ |
| key       | string | The key of the item to merge               |
| value     | any    | The value to merge with the existing value |

Returns:

this

## Example

```js
container.merge("key", { merge: values });
```
